document_data.name: Jesthren Darakh
document_data.mainbody: '''Jesthren Darakh''' was the first [[Nentyarch]] of the [[Darakh Dynasty]] to rule [[Narfell]].
document_data.Activities: In {{Yearlink|-399}}, Jesthren slew the previous Nentyarch, [[Orlathaun Orgolath|Orlathaun]] of the [[Orgolath Dynasty]], and claimed the ''[[Crown of Narfell]]'' for himself, establishing the ruling line what would reign until Narfell's destruction during the [[Great Conflagration (war)|Great Conflagration]] in {{Yearlink|-150}}. Jesthren ruled for many years until {{Yearlink|-322}}.
document_data.Relationships: Jesthren was the [[half-fiend]] son of the [[human]] woman [[Larnaeril Darakh|Larnaeril]] and the [[demon lord]] [[Orcus]].
